name: Delphlyx
slogan: Delphlyx is a recruitment platform for the decision-makers within professional sport
description: Delphlyx is a platform that connects the old & the new methods of scouting professional football players. Decision-makers are inundated with player reports by their scouts on a weekly basis, our platform enables them to make a swift and fair comparison of the target with two similar 'type' players.

jobs.title: Technical co-founder
jobs.description:
Are you interested in using technology to revolutionise the recruitment of professional athletes by the biggest clubs in the world? Do you want to get in at the conception of a technology business that seeks not just success, but also one that will have a meaningful impact on the industry?

If so, please get in touch!

**The Opportunity**
•	Join a business at the beginning. You will get the chance not just to shape the product and underlying technology, but also the business model and how we do business.
•	The business is in its early stages so this is a unique opportunity to join a startup and have significant input in its model, growth and direction.
•	It is an opportunity to build a business, whilst also doing good and having fun along the way. 
•	This business is in the process of ramping up to gain investment so there is the option to join now for equity or agree salary + equity subject to investment.

**About you**
•	Love to build. You may have worked at a start up before or been in a large company and frustrated by the lack of opportunity to really build product. This is the chance to build something and architect it from the ground floor.
•	Open to risk. Nothing is guaranteed, particularly in a new start-up and you embrace this risk and see it as a chance to do something new.
•	Want to build a different type of business? At Delphlyx, employees and stakeholders will have autonomy to drive innovative ideas forward.  
•	Do you have a love for sports? This business is all about translating in-game and historical data for the benefit of professional clubs. 

**About us**
•	We want to create a platform that enables the decision-makers within professional sport to do their job efficiently.
•	Founder, head of sales and non-executive director have worked in professional football. 
•	Significant knowledge in professional sport with a plethora of contacts enabling us to close deals with clubs once the product is ready. 

**Role**
•	You will hire and direct a team of developers; test their work, deploy code and communicate changes to our customers.
•	If we encounter technical problems; you will research and suggest changes, and implement improvements. 
•	You will develop and launch the platform.

We are looking for a commercially minded CTO who can oversee all elements of the technology build. The ideal candidate will have Product Manager experience and understand how to build the architecture of a technology system, as well as design and scope out the platform to build.
Prior experience in a similar CTO role is crucial, and backend programming skills would be a bonus.

The CTO will be a partner, wholly responsible for building the platform, managing the tech team and creating the technology vision.

Salary DOE plus generous equity package on offer.
Please get in touch.
